qas.question: Which movie featured Queen's Bohemian Rhapsody?
What year did Queen get a boost in North American sales due to being featured in a movie?
In what year did Queen win an MTV award?
How high did the album Classic Queen chart on the Billboard 200?
How many times platinum did Classic Queen go in the US?

context: Queen's popularity was stimulated in North America when "Bohemian Rhapsody" was featured in the 1992 comedy film <a0_0>Wayne's World<a0_0/>. Its inclusion helped the song reach number two on the Billboard Hot 100 for five weeks in <a1_0><a2_0>1992<a2_0/><a1_0/> (it remained in the Hot 100 for over 40 weeks), and won the band an MTV Award at the 1992 MTV Video Music Awards. The compilation album Classic Queen also reached number <a3_0>four<a3_0/> on the Billboard 200, and is certified <a4_0>three times<a4_0/> platinum in the US. Wayne's World footage was used to make a new music video for "Bohemian Rhapsody", with which the band and management were delighted.
